entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse We might get the truth if Donald Trump would stay away .
Hydroxychloroquine will kill about 30% of the people who take for coronavirus and it won't help the rest .
